d1p1:Details.d1p1:HeaderDescription: {\rtf1\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0 Times New Roman;}{\f1 Verdana;}}{\colortbl\red0\green0\blue0 ;\red0\green0\blue255 ;}{\*\listoverridetable}{\stylesheet {\ql\cf0 Normal;}{\*\cs1\f1\fs20\cf0 Default Paragraph Font;}{\*\cs2\sbasedon1\f1\fs20\cf0 Line Number;}{\*\cs3\ul\cf1 Hyperlink;}}\splytwnine\htmautsp\sectd\pard\plain\ql{\f1\fs20\cf0 vielen Dank f\u252\'fcr Ihre Bestellung.}\f1\fs20\cf0\par}{\rtf1\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0 Times New Roman;}{\f1 Verdana;}}{\colortbl\red0\green0\blue0 ;\red0\green0\blue255 ;}{\*\listoverridetable}{\stylesheet {\ql\cf0 Normal;}{\*\cs1\f1\fs20\cf0 Default Paragraph Font;}{\*\cs2\sbasedon1\f1\fs20\cf0 Line Number;}{\*\cs3\ul\cf1 Hyperlink;}}\splytwnine\htmautsp\sectd\pard\plain\ql\f1\fs20\par}

d1p1:ListLineItem.d1p1:Description: Die ideale Software zum Schreiben von Angeboten und Rechnungen.

d1p1:Details.d1p1:FooterDescription: {\rtf1\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0 Times New Roman;}{\f1 Verdana;}}{\colortbl\red0\green0\blue0 ;\red0\green0\blue255 ;}{\*\listoverridetable}{\stylesheet {\ql\cf0 Normal;}{\*\cs1\f1\fs20\cf0 Default Paragraph Font;}{\*\cs2\sbasedon1\f1\fs20\cf0 Line Number;}{\*\cs3\ul\cf1 Hyperlink;}}\splytwnine\htmautsp\sectd\pard\plain\ql{\f1\fs20\cf0 Damit Sie m\u246\'f6glichst schnell Ihre Seriennummer erhalten, mit der Sie die Demo-Version zur Vollversion freischalten k\u246\'f6nnen, ersuchen wir sobald wie m\u246\'f6glich um \u220\'dcberweisung auf das Konto der BKS Bank}\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\qc\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\qc{\f1\fs20\cf0 BIC: BFKKAT2K, IBAN: AT901700000142001632 }\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\ql\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\ql{\f1\fs20\cf0 lautend auf WoAx-IT.}\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\ql\f1\fs20\par}{\rtf1\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0 Times New Roman;}{\f1 Verdana;}}{\colortbl\red0\green0\blue0 ;\red0\green0\blue255 ;}{\*\listoverridetable}{\stylesheet {\ql\cf0 Normal;}{\*\cs1\cf0 Default Paragraph Font;}{\*\cs2\sbasedon1\f1\fs20\cf0 Line Number;}{\*\cs3\ul\cf1 Hyperlink;}}\splytwnine\htmautsp\sectd\pard\plain\ql\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\ql{\f1\fs20\cf0 Sch\u246\'f6ne Gr\u252\'fc\u223\'dfe}\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\ql\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\ql\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\ql\f1\fs20\cf0\par\pard\plain\ql{\f1\fs20\cf0 Wolfgang Axamit}\f1\fs20\cf0\par}
